Name: Guardian Force - Saturn Tribute
About the game: Attack in 360 degrees! Guardian Force, the timeless shooting game featuring cyber tanks, is finally back! The Guardians, a secret society wielding the power of the Force, have readied their tanks and intend on crushing the aspirations of the Hammerbolt Empire! This is an auto-scrolling, multidirectional shooting game released by SUCCESS in 1998. This masterpiece of the past is given new life using the specially-developed 'Zebra Engine.' The new features included such as game rewind, slow mode, and quick save greatly improve ease of play. Online rankings have also been added!
